text: Back For My Life is an EP by the German power metal band Masterplan. It also contains a multimedia section. ==Track listing== # "Back For My Life" (single version) # "Crimson Rider" (album version) # "Love Is A Rock" (non-album track) # "Killing In Time" (non-album track) # "Killing In Time" (instrumental version) # "Back For My Life" (album version) ==References== * Category:Masterplan (band) albums Category:2004 EPs Category:AFM Records EPs
title: Back for My Life
